relatedBlades.title: Web security for remote workers with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Simple malware protection enforced with exceptional speed and consistency around the world
relatedBlades.copy:
Protect "work-from-anywhere" users from malware, ransomware, and other online threats while safeguarding your organization's data, finances, and reputation.

Bolster your threat defense by starting with DNS filtering and progressively layer full secure web gateway (SWG) controls and visibility wherever your users are â€” all without disrupting their productivity.

streamPoster.description: Illustration of a Cloudflare employee working from home

columnContent.title: Mitigate Internet risks
columnContent.description: Stop malware infections, data leaks, phishing, and more. Stay ahead of the evolving threats with dynamic, built-in threat intelligence.

columnContent.title: Enable growth and productivity
columnContent.description: Scale protections across your remote and hybrid workforce. Improve user experiences with fast, unintrusive filtering and deliver 100% uptime.

columnContent.title: Simplify security operations
columnContent.description: Decrease manual effort by automating policy workflows. Reduce mean time to detect (MTTD) and respond (MTTR). Embrace a "set and forget" configuration.

columnContent.title: Consolidate to reduce costs
columnContent.description: Replace legacy tools with cloud-native security. Reduce the number of vendors and contracts to lower CapEx and total cost of ownership (TCO).

relatedBlades.title: Filter and inspect web activity
relatedBlades.copy:
Regain visibility and enforce consistent protections across your remote workforce â€” modernize Internet security with capabilities from Cloudflare's Security Service Edge (SSE) platform.

- __DNS filtering:__ Block harmful and inappropriate content to mitigate risk and enforce acceptable use policies.
- __SWG:__ Proxy and inspect all L4â€“L7 Internet traffic in a single pass with DNS / IP / port /  protocol filters and HTTPS / SSH content controls.
- __Natively integrated remote browser isolation (RBI):__ Insulate local devices from malware by running all browser code on Cloudflare's low-latency global network.
- __Natively integrated data loss prevention (DLP):__ Detect and block sensitive data in HTTP(S) traffic and files.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Bouvet uses Cloudflare to secure Internet and cloud access

content.value: , a Scandinavian IT and digital communications consultancy, sought a simpler, more consolidated approach to protect its hybrid workforce.
Today, the company uses Cloudflare to shield remote and office users from online threats with services like DNS filtering, SWG inspection, RBI, and more.
In the process, Bouvet has been able to replace legacy tools and enforce consistent Internet security policies across 2300 employees and 17 offices in Norway and Sweden with a single vendor.
"We depend on Cloudflare to reduce our attack surface by securing our ports, filtering threats, and cleaning up our traffic."

relatedBlades.title: Simple, fast web security backed by mass-scale threat intelligence
relatedBlades.description: Migrate to Cloudflare starting with DNS filtering for quick time to value â€” then build your web security approach on that foundation.

columnContent.title: Simple, flexible management
columnContent.description: Multiple deployment options with and without a device client. One policy manager for DNS, HTTP, DLP, and isolation policies.

columnContent.title: Consistent enforcement
columnContent.description: Superior remote user experiences with a global network that is approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms from ~%{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of Internet users.

columnContent.title: Mass-scale threat intelligence
columnContent.description: AI-backed threat-hunting models informed by Cloudflare's visibility into approximately %{DNSQueriesPerDay} trillion queries per day.

columnContent.title: One platform, one network
columnContent.description: Consolidate SSE / Zero Trust capabilities on Cloudflare's unified platform and control plane.
